manifest:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:versionCode="41" android:versionName="2.0.3" android:installLocation="auto" package="org.wordpress.android">
	<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="7" android:targetSdkVersion="10" />
	<application android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090005" android:label="WordPress" android:icon="res/drawable/app_icon.png" android:name="WordPress" android:debuggable="false" android:hardwareAccelerated="true">
		<activity android:name="Settings" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" android:label="Create a Link" android:name="Link" />
		<activity android:name="AddAccount" android:configChanges="0xa0" android:windowSoftInputMode="0x10" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090006" android:name="EditPost" android:configChanges="0xa0" android:windowSoftInputMode="0x2">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SEND" />
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.SEND_MULTIPLE" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
				<data android:mimeType="text/plain" />
				<data android:mimeType="image/*" />
				<data android:mimeType="video/*" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090006" android:name=".Read" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:theme="resourceId:0x7f090006" android:name="Preferences" android:windowSoftInputMode="0x2" />
		<service android:label="Comment Service" android:name="CommentService" />
		<receiver android:name="CommentBroadcastReceiver" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" android:name="ReplyToComment" />
		<activity android:name="SelectCategories" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Dialog" android:label="Add New Category" android:name=".AddCategory" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:theme="@android:style/Theme.Light" android:name="Signup" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:name="NewAccount" />
		<activity android:name="ViewStats" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:label="QuickPress" android:name=".AddQuickPressShortcut">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.CREATE_SHORTCUT" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:name="AddAcountSettings" />
		<activity android:name="ViewPosts" />
		<activity android:name="Dashboard" android:configChanges="0xa0">
			<intent-filter>
				<action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
				<category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
			</intent-filter>
		</activity>
		<activity android:name="About" />
		<activity android:name="EditContent" android:configChanges="0xa0" android:windowSoftInputMode="0x10" />
		<activity android:name="Comments" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:name="ViewCommentActivity" />
		<activity android:name="Posts" android:launchMode="singleTask" android:configChanges="0xa0" />
		<activity android:name="ViewPostActivity" />
	</application>
	<supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:smallScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:largeScreens="true" />
	<uses-permission xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:name="android.permission.CAMERA" />
	<uses-permission xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.VIBRATE" />
	<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" android:required="false" />
	<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.location" android:required="false" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_SHORTCUT" />
	<uses-permission android:name="com.android.launcher.permission.UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT" />
	<instrumentation android:name="com.google.android.testing.nativedriver.server.ServerInstrumentation" android:targetPackage="org.wordpress.android" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WAKE_LOCK" />
	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD" />
</manifest>
